events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience in software development and programming languages.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to your case and will reach out to you with next steps very soon.
The initial screening call was conducted and you demonstrated a solid understanding of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
Thank you for your prompt response and flexibility regarding the upcoming technical interview schedule.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC with our senior development team.
